plays.text: Penalty to Jeff O'Neill 2 minutes for Interference Gary Roberts

Goal scored by Darcy Tucker assisted by Alyn McCauley and Wade Belak
Penalty to Wade Belak 2 minutes for Slashing Kevyn Adams
Penalty to Tomas Kaberle 2 minutes for High Sticking Craig Adams
Goal scored by Shayne Corson assisted by Tie Domi and Robert Reichel

Penalty to Tie Domi 2 minutes for Crosschecking Kevyn Adams
